SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ClearWindow
The ClearWindow class is responsible for clearing a specified area of the window.
Code
Enumeration representing the different possible actions in the "Baba Is You" game controller.
Direction
Enumerates the possible directions in the game.
DrawEnd
The DrawEnd class is responsible for drawing the end game screens, such as victory or defeat.
DrawGame
The DrawGame class is responsible for drawing the game board and its elements.
EventGame
The EventGame class handles different types of events in the "Baba Is You" game.
Game
The Game class contains the main logic for running the "Baba Is You" game.
GameBoard
Represents the game board for the game "Baba Is You".
ImagesEndLoader
The ImagesEndLoader class is responsible for loading and storing images used at the end of the game.
ImagesLoader
The ImagesLoader class is responsible for loading and storing images for objects and text used in the game.
Main
The Main class contains the entry point for running the "Baba Is You" game.
Name
Represents a Name on the game board.
Object
Represents an Object on the game board.
Operator
Represents an Operator on the game board.
Property
Represents a Property on the game board.
Rule
Represents the rules and logic of the game.
Square
Represents a Square on the game board.
Type
The Type enum represents the different categories of images used in the game.
